html: my people shall dwell in a peaceable habitation. Zion is a place of "peaceful dwelling places," "secure homes," and "undisturbed places of rest" (NIV). This verse reminds us of a modern revelation in which Zion is called "a land of peace, a city of refuge, a place of safety for the saints of the Most High God" (D&C 45:66). Elder Orson Pratt applied 32:17-19 to the Saints when they sought in the Rocky Mountains relief from persecution.
